resources.string: BMI
You will get hungry as you get more active, but you will stay healthy.
If you are active already, try to eat high-calorie foods, like nuts, or homemade chips.
Have you tried mass gainers? Only if you also work out, of course.
You can gain weight if you take vitamins. Be careful, though, certain types will lead to fat gain.
Fast food, snacks and late meals can help you gain weight, but it mostly means fat gaining, and it can lead to unhealthy habits.
If all else fails, follow a doctor\'s, a nutritionist\'s or a trainer\'s advice.
You are underweight. Try to reach at least
kilograms.
BMI Index:
Please check your age.
Please check your height.
Please check your weight.
Walk as much as you can.
Drink a lot of fluids (pure water, if possible).
Eat a lot of vegetables and soup.
Do not overdo anything.
Give yourself time, and hold on. You need a new lifestyle.
You might need advice from a doctor, nutritionist and a personal trainer.
You are extremely overweight. Try to reach at least
kilograms as a start, then reach
kilograms in the end.
Your weight is perfect. If there is something you don\'t like, get more active.
You look great. Keep your good shape.
Do not even think about losing weight.
You are ideal.
It is time to be satisfied with yourself.
If you are not satisfied with yourself, it has psychological causes.
You are healthy. Even if you do not like your reflection in the mirror, you should never weigh less than
kilograms.
Eat or drink everything in moderation.
Get more and more active gradually. If you are radical at the start, then give up, you\'ll gain weight in the long run.
Perseverance is the key to success.
Do not lose zest after a week without success.
Establish reachable goals, and reach them.
You might need advice from a doctor or a nuritionist.
You are overweight. Try to reach at least
kilograms.
